abstract: Perform fast Fourier transforms out of place on 2D complex data.
overview:
## Overview

The functions in this group use the following operation for a complex-to-complex transform:

The temporary buffer versions perform the same operation but use a temporary buffer for improved performance.

items.description: Computes a 2D forward or inverse out-of-place, single-precision complex FFT.
items.name: vDSP_fft2d_zop

items.description: Computes a 2D forward or inverse out-of-place, double-precision complex FFT.
items.name: vDSP_fft2d_zopD

items.description: Computes a 2D forward or inverse out-of-place, single-precision complex FFT using a temporary buffer.
items.name: vDSP_fft2d_zopt

items.description: Computes a 2D forward or inverse out-of-place, double-precision complex FFT using a temporary buffer.
items.name: vDSP_fft2d_zoptD

sections.title: Out-of-Place FFT Functions with Temporary Buffer

items.description: Perform fast Fourier transforms in place on 2D complex data.
items.name: In-Place Functions for 2D Complex FFT

title: Out-of-Place Functions for 2D Complex FFT
